CustomField.description: Intended for use as a Field for Filter Criteria on Reports & Dashboards when report results should be dynamic based on the Current Running User, not the User who created the record, or owns the record. Example: Billable Resources need to see 'My Assignments', 'My Time Cards' or 'My Expense Reports', and those records were created/owned by the Project Manager or Project Coordinator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in Reporting when results should be dynamic based on Running User, not User who created the record, or owns the record. Ex: Billable Resources need to see My Assignments, My TCs, My Expense Reports and those records were created/owned by PM/PC.
CustomField.label: Resource is Current User
